'''Cake for Traveler''' is an item given to the player on the Traveler's set [[birthday]] via [[Birthday/Traveler|mail]].

This variant can be obtained between September 28, 2022 - September 27, 2023.

==Description After Use==
A gift you obtained on a very special day.

Here's to you, traveler from beyond the mountains and seas.<br>
Wishing you a joyous journey in this great big world.

"Every week, we update the recommended dishes, every month, the moon will send down new blessings, but wow, it's almost nine thousand hours to go before we celebrate this day again! Paimon will spend every day onward with you, whether it rains or shines, hehe!"
